page.title: 11Entertainments,Arts Club.
page.content: The Arts Club is situated onthe west side of St.Austell.It has 290 paid up members and provides the following activities:photography,drama,bridge, chess,flower arranging,painting and music.To encourage younger children there are various drama groups and theatre workshops which are held on Saturday mornings and during holidays. When the St.Austell Players were formed in the 1930's there were 40 members. Their most successful production ever was "The Wizard of Oz, although their present play "Hayday" is popular with an audience of 300 people each evening."
